posts.postText: I don't plan on importing all the data files for the blacklist, meaning everyone will be unblacklisted with the new IP. Ben can do this if he wants them done, but unless you have access to the files you won't understand why I don't feel like waiting that long for them. When/If I ever get it switched to MySQL, this won't happen again.

I'm not going to do this.
We'll consider this a "re-birth" of jail.
All slates are clean, our staff is ready, let's keep it controlled, running, and fun.

>> Ben":240kkzuf]All slates are clean 
Does this mean that all bans are gone also?

>> >> Ben":2g7tz51t]All slates are clean 
Does this mean that all bans are gone also? 
God I hope not.

I perma'd 300 different players permnantly with bird flu over a month during his "operation cleanup".

>> >> >> Ben":1p27aiz5]All slates are clean 
Does this mean that all bans are gone also? 
God I hope not.

I perma'd 300 different players permnantly with bird flu over a month during his "operation cleanup".

Just blacklists will be gone.
So everyone has another chance to be a guard
